selectedVerses.text: a day of darkness and gloom, a day of clouds and thick darkness! Like blackness there is spread upon the mountains a great and powerful people; their like has never been before, nor will be again after them through the years of all generations.
the land of gloom like thick darkness, like deep shadow without any order, where light is as thick darkness."
Is not the day of the LORD darkness, and not light, and gloom with no brightness in it?
And they will look to the earth, but behold, distress and darkness, the gloom of anguish. And they will be thrust into thick darkness.
These are waterless springs and mists driven by a storm. For them the gloom of utter darkness has been reserved.
